title: Sector Area Calculator: Area, Arc Length, Perimeter from Radius & Angle | CalcDomain

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Area from degrees: \( A = \frac{\theta}{360^\circ} \cdot \pi r^2 \) Area from radians: \( A = \frac{1}{2} r^2 \theta \) Arc length (deg): \( L = \frac{\theta}{360^\circ} \cdot 2 \pi r \) Arc length (rad): \( L = r \theta \) From arc length and radius: \( \theta = \frac{L}{r} \) (rad), then \( A = \frac{1}{2} r L \) Sector perimeter: \( P = 2r + L \)
